function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge and protection leading to rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High infection rates and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Enhance public health education and provide protective measures","Technologies":"5G-enabled communication for disseminating health information","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"New phenomenon and lack of extant literature","Impact":"Limited understanding of the interaction between 5G and COVID-19","Mitigation":"Encourage further research and scholarly exploration","Technologies":"Research collaboration and academic institutions","People":"Researchers and academics","Owner":"Research institutions and funding bodies"},{"Description":"Spread of virus through close contact","Impact":"High transmission rates in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective contact tracing and social distancing measures","Technologies":"5G-enabled contact tracing apps and remote monitoring systems","People":"General public in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government authorities and technology companies"}]}
